alert.note: Alert for Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 16 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Upper Michigan, including the following county, Luce. * WHEN...Until 500 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 457 PM EDT, rain and snowmelt is occurring, and may cause minor flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain may result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of East Central Luce County - www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
